results.title: The Chemistry of digestion
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Human Body”.
Nutrient molecules in food are too large to be absorbed into the body. Through the chemical processes of digestion, these nutrients are split into small, component molecules that can be absorbed. Animation, X-ray footage and laboratory demonstrations illustrate the major steps in the digestion of carbohydrates, fats and proteins.

results.title: On the nose
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Human senses”.
An introduction to the sense of smell. Animation is used to illustrate the operations of the smell receptors in the nasal cavities and how this information is processed by the brain. Clearly defines the concept of smelling and recognition of odours.

results.title: Matter of taste
results.creator_credit: David H. Gluck, Naomi Robin, James B. Maas, James B. Maas and David H. Gluck Productions and National Geographic Society
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Human senses”.
Looks at the important role played by taste in the human body. Investigates the chemical reactions in papillae and how information is obtained and relayed to the brain and the taste identified as sweet, sour,salty or bitter.
results.creator_credit_for_label: David H. Gluck, Naomi Robin, James B. Maas, James B. Maas and David H. Gluck Productions and National Geographic Society

results.title: In touch with the world
results.creator_credit: James B. Maas and David H. Gluck Productions and National Geographic Society
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Human senses”.
Explains the functions of the human skin as a sense organ and the ability of the receptors to differentiate between at least five different kinds of sensations - touch, pressure, heat, cold and pain. Shows how the sense of touch has contributed to human development and adaptation of the human species to its environment.

results.title: Tugboat Mickey
results.creator_credit: Clyde Geronimi, Walt Disney and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Gang’s All Here”
Tugboat Captain Mickey hears what he thinks is a distress signal from a sinking ship and orders his two man crew to the rescue. Their energetic ineptitude leads from one mishap to another.

results.title: Mickey's trailer
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Gang’s All Here”.
Mickey, Donald and Goofy go for a holiday in Mickey’s trailer. When the trailer becomes unhooked some hair-raising adventures follow. Suitable for primary level.

results.title: The Grapes of wrath
results.creator_credit: Arthur Barron and C B S
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “The Great American novel”.
Compares the situation of the farm families of the 1920s as portrayed in Steinbeck’s “Grapes of Wrath” to the situations faced by the Appalachian migrants and negroes of today.
